about_the_game:
Tactical Turn-Based Roguelike

Choose from 8 distinct Archetypes, each offering a unique blend of skills and playstyle, tailoring your Prometheus to your preferred combat strategy. Battle your way to Olympus in this tactical turn-based roguelike, where every combat is a deadly dance, and the world moves only when you do. As the Titan Prometheus, master strategic combat, upgrade abilities, and face mythic foes and permadeath in procedurally generated dungeons.

World Moves Only When You Do

Every step and attack counts. The world and its dangers react only to your actions, creating a deadly dance where timing, strategy, and precision are key to surviving the turn-based challenges.

A Heroic Quest

Embark on a journey through five chapters of epic battles and challenges, each featuring four unique levels and a climactic boss fight. As Prometheus, a Titan seeking to steal the sacred fire from the gods, you'll navigate treacherous landscapes, battle mythical creatures, and confront powerful foes. From the abandoned shores of Lemnos, scale the volcanic mountain of Mosychlos, navigate the underworld's treacherous rivers, explore the depths of Hades, and traverse the stormy seas. Battle undead, demons, titans, and even the gods themselves. Each chapter offers unique challenges and rewards. Test your skills and replay the campaign on a higher difficulty for even more significant challenges.

Key Features

• Tactical Turn-Based Combat: Master a synchronous battle system where the world reacts to your actions. Timing and strategy are crucial to survival.
• Upgrade Your Abilities: Customize your Titan's powers by choosing from random drop cards, each offering unique upgrades. Your skills evolve as you conquer enemies and discover new strategies.
• Procedurally Generated Dungeons: Every journey into the underworld is different. Explore ever-changing levels, face randomized challenges, and adapt to a world that shifts with each run.
• Permadeath Tension: Death is permanent. One wrong move is all over, but with each loss comes new knowledge, unlocking powerful abilities and weapons for future attempts.
• Followers and Pets: Use your skills to call upon loyal pets and followers, binding them to your will in combat.
• Epic Boss Battles: Face against titanic foes drawn from Greek mythology in pulse-pounding, strategic showdowns. Survive the might of Medusa, Cerberus, and other mythic creatures.
• Rich Mythological Lore: Dive deep into a world inspired by ancient myths. With a storyline rooted in the original tales of Greek gods and heroes, this is not just a battle of strength but of destiny.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or Intel® Arc™ A380 or AMD Radeon™ R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or Intel® Arc™ A750 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470

short_description: Become the titan Prometheus in this tactical turn-based roguelike, where every battle is a chessboard and every move counts. In a world that only moves when you move, dominate strategic battles, upgrade your skills, and face mythical enemies and permadeath.
